subtitle.line1: Currently studying Computer Science at EPFL in Switzerland, passionate about creating modern and performant applications.
subtitle.line2: Transforming ideas into elegant digital solutions with expertise in full-stack development.

featured.intro: From automated deployment scripts to full-stack web applications and data analysis projects, my portfolio showcases a blend of technical expertise and problem-solving skills.

categories.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
categories.description: Building modern, responsive interfaces with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

categories.title: BACKEND DEVELOPMENT
categories.description: Creating robust APIs and server solutions with Node.js, Python, and PostgreSQL

categories.title: SYSTEM ADMINISTRATION
categories.description: Automating deployments with Bash & PowerShell, managing server setups

categories.title: DATA ANALYSIS
categories.description: Processing and analyzing data with Python, pandas, and visualization libraries

expertise.intro: Leveraging modern technologies and frameworks to deliver efficient, scalable solutions. Quick learner with a structured approach to problem-solving.

items.title: FRONTEND
descriptions: React, TypeScript, JavaScript for modern web interfaces.
HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS for responsive design.

items.title: BACKEND
descriptions: Node.js and Python for server-side development.
PostgreSQL, Supabase, REST APIs for data management.

items.title: TOOLS & DEVOPS
descriptions: Git, GitHub, VS Code for version control and development.
Bash, PowerShell, Linux for automation and system administration.

running.intro: As a full-stack developer, I focus on creating efficient solutions using modern technologies. From idea to prototype to deployment, I bring projects to life with clean code and best practices.

empty.message: Check out my projects on GitHub

about.name: Victor Frangov
about.description: Computer Science student at EPFL with a passion for technology and problem-solving. Originally from Montréal, Canada, currently studying in Switzerland. I'm always interested in collaborating on innovative projects and learning new technologies.
